name: DevoxxFrance 2013
terms:
Devoxx Session Invitation Acceptance Form

By clicking "I Accept" below, you are confirming that you will present the session shown below at the 2013 Devoxx France conference which is scheduled to take place on March 27-29, 2013 in Paris, France.

types.name: Quickie
types.description:
• Short 15 minute presentations during Lunch breaks
  • They are not recorded

types.name: Hands-on Labs
types.description:
• 3 hour hands-on sessions.  
  • They are not recorded for Parleys.com. 
  • Hands-on instructors receive a full pass.

types.name: University
types.description:
• University talks are in depth presentations of 3 hours 
  • They are recorded for Parleys.com
  • University speakers receive a full pass

types.name: Conference
types.description:
• Each conference talk is 50 minutes long
  • They're recorded for Parleys.com
  • Conference speakers receive a full pass.

types.name: BOF
types.description:
• BOF sessions are 60 minutes long, scheduled in the evening and are informal.
  • The BOF sessions are not recorded for Parleys.com

types.name: AM des décideurs
types.description: L'après-midi des décideurs permet de prendre du recul sur notre industrie et d'écouter les retours d'experience d'utilisateurs

types.name: Tools in Action
types.description:
• Tools in Action are 30 minute presentations demonstrating a programming tool.
  • They're recorded for Parleys.com. 
  • Tools in Action speakers receive a full pass.

tracks.name: Jeux, Web et Mobile
tracks.description: HTML5, Javascript, Architectures webs, Cloud computing, nosql, Android, AS3, Flex, développement embarqué...

tracks.name: Infrastructure, hardware d’hier et de demain
Java, one track to rule them all
tracks.description: Java SE 7/8, Java EE, Spring, les outils et les librairies, tout ce qui tourne autour de Java en général.

tracks.name: Développeur au quotidien
tracks.description: Pratiques Agiles, Kanban, retour d'expérience, de "Vrais Projets de la Vraie Vie", communauté, métier, devops, TDD, BDD.

tracks.name: Langages alternatifs
tracks.description: Groovy, Scala, Clojure, Ceylon, Kotlin, Javascript, Fantom, JRuby. Ce thème regroupera aussi les librairies ou les frameworks sur ces langages

presTerms:
Devoxx 2013 Speaker Consent Form

On behalf of myself and my company/organization, ("Organization") and in consideration of my participation in the Event, I grant Devoxx (and its designated contractors), and its subsidiaries and affiliates under common control ("Devoxx") the following permissions in connection with Devoxx France 2013, which are scheduled to take place March 27-29, 2013 (the "Event"):

  1. Permission to use my name, biographic material, likeness, and portrait (hereinafter collectively referred to as my "Likeness") for the purpose of publicizing my presentation(s) at/participation in the Event (my "Presentation").
  2. Permission to make sound and visual recordings of my Presentation (the "Recordings").
  3. Permission to use, copy, translate, reformat, broadcast, publish, and distribute all or parts of my Presentation, the Recordings, a transcript of the Recordings, and any presentation materials that I provide to Devoxx and use in connection with my Presentation (the "Presentation Materials"). This includes, without limitation, the right to make and distribute a DVD of the Event proceedings that contains the Recordings and Presentation Materials, the right to distribute the Presentation Materials via streaming and download from the Parleys.com web site, and the right to distribute, broadcast and rebroadcast my Presentation as part of Event proceedings and archives that Devoxx makes available on its web site. Any such use must be in connection with the Event, and must not be misleading or reflect negatively on my Organization or me.

I understand that neither my Organization nor I will receive any compensation for granting these permissions. Devoxx is not granted any other permissions or rights with respect to my Likeness, my Presentation, the Recordings, or the Presentation Materials.

(1) I am the person who is accepting the invitation to present the session listed above;

(2) grant this permission and agree to the terms and conditions set forth above on behalf of my Organization and myself;

(3) have authority to agree to such terms and conditions on behalf of my Organization or co-speaker; and

(4) confirm that no further consents or permissions are required by Devoxx in order to use the Presentation Materials.
